title: #204: A Penny For Your 40-50 Negative Thoughts
description:
Need to stop having 40-50 negative thoughts per day? Let us take care of it for you! This week we talk about Shannon's pre-Valentine's dinner on "Real Housewives of Orange County." We also touch on Vicki's medium, Meghan's parenting style, and Tamra's latest experience in entrepreneurialism.
Then it's on to "Married To Medicine" where certain things transpire. Specifically, the return of Mariah.
There's also gossip about Jax Taylor, Tamra's son, and GG from "Shahs." Come listen!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
